result.title: And you ?
result.content: I tried to talk with some red's but just 1 answer, so i decided to ask here for all the contestants. I would like to know what is your training plan.What you recommend to me ? How many hours do you spend to read the editorial ? What is your favorite site (codeforces,uva,tc,spoj...)? How many hours per day do you practice ? Please answer. Sorry for my English.
